channel.title: Comments on: Vanilla Mousse Tart with Strawberries and Macaron

item.title: By: hoda
item.dc:creator: hoda
item.description: i really liked all the recipes and the pics of the desserts cause they gave me t he impression of being happy and ready to go to the kitchen and have some of that awesome desserts , thanks for that magic touch that you have added to ALL THOSE who have seen and been happy because of you.
item.content:encoded: i really liked all the recipes and the pics of the desserts cause they gave me t he impression of being happy and ready to go to the kitchen and have some of that awesome desserts , thanks for that magic touch that you have added to ALL THOSE who have seen and been happy because of you.

item.content:encoded: Woowwww very impressive! Love the strawberry sail

item.title: By: betty
item.dc:creator: betty
item.description: beautiful! have fun at the classes :O)

item.title: By: Simon @ the heart of food
item.dc:creator: Simon @ the heart of food
item.description:
Like how you presented the dessert. Looks quite appetising.
It's interesting to see that you're practicing skills in order to learn from a class. Totally understandable from what you've stated but just not something that I hear often :)
item.content:encoded:
Like how you presented the dessert. Looks quite appetising.

It’s interesting to see that you’re practicing skills in order to learn from a class. Totally understandable from what you’ve stated but just not something that I hear often ðŸ™‚

item.description: Oh wow, multiple components but with unifying flavours! Have fun on your cooking course. Can't wait to see what skills you garner from your time there.
item.content:encoded: Oh wow, multiple components but with unifying flavours! Have fun on your cooking course. Can’t wait to see what skills you garner from your time there.

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: OMG! This dessert looks amazing! You will wow them at the cooking class.
item.content:encoded: OMG! This dessert looks amazing! You will wow them at the cooking class.

item.title: By: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com

item.description: This dessert is too damn good looking to eat! I am at awe at your macaron.
item.content:encoded: This dessert is too damn good looking to eat! I am at awe at your macaron.

item.description: Lovely presentation Anita! I'm sure you'll be more than prepared.
item.content:encoded: Lovely presentation Anita! I’m sure you’ll be more than prepared.

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Have fun in Melbourne - can't wait to hear about your trip! Say hello to the people there for me, especially Paul and Kirsten! That dessert looks fantastic Anita - I think you are more thanprepared for the class. Next thing I know, you'll be teaching it!
item.content:encoded: Have fun in Melbourne – can’t wait to hear about your trip! Say hello to the people there for me, especially Paul and Kirsten! That dessert looks fantastic Anita – I think you are more thanprepared for the class. Next thing I know, you’ll be teaching it!
